location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4294/46 'Transmission of a book entitled "The Countries of the Near Middle East" to the Government of India'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter addressed to the Government of India, External Affairs Department on behalf of Ernest Bevin (the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs) enclosing a book entitled The Countries of the Near and Middle East. The letter also details how the publication was originally received by British Embassy, Moscow who requested it be transferred to the Government of India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
